name: Rainbow Cloud
description:
In this 9 Level Game, you have to come up with creative ways to draw Rainbows. In such a way that you deliver all the candy to our fellow friend cloudy. Every  Level reveals a bit more of the Story.

This game will be most likely become an update after the jam with more levels,  a new main character. More obstacles, portals, challenges, and more.

This Game was made for theTrijam-113.

Controls

  • Use your mouse to draw.
  • Space Play/Restart Level

Tools used

  • Unity
  • Audacity
  • Gimp
